entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
